author: Michael Holden
title: Show typical British resolve, Queen to tell nation amid coronavirus outbreak
description: Queen Elizabeth will call on Britons to show the same resolve as their forebears and take on the challenge and disruption caused by the coronavirus outbreak with good-humoured resolve when she makes an extremely rare address to rally the nation on Sunday.
